name: react-toastified
description: An easy-to-use, customizable toast notification system for React apps

scripts.prepare-package: mkdir -p npm-package/components && mkdir -p npm-package/styles && cp -r ./components/* npm-package/components/ && cp styles/Toast.css npm-package/styles/Toast.css && babel ./components/Toast.js --out-file ./npm-package/components/Toast.transpiled.js && terser ./npm-package/components/Toast.transpiled.js -o ./npm-package/components/Toast.min.js && postcss ./styles/Toast.css -o ./npm-package/styles/Toast.min.css

author: Justin Charo
